definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide

sentences.english: Thus a dotted half note or minim is equal in length to three quarter notes or crotchets.
sentences.chinese: 半音加符點，時值等於三個四分音符。

sentences.english: A second dot added after the first dot increases the value of the original note by a further quarter.
sentences.chinese: 再加一個符點則在原來基礎上增加一個四分音符。

sentences.english: Tap your thighs to each quarter note.
sentences.chinese: 請按四分音符輕拍大腿。

definition: dieresis/umlaut/diacritical mark separating two adjacent syllables
tone mark on a Chinese syllable (i.e. accents on ā á ǎ à)/(music) key signature
